title: I have heard before that the old Dow Chemical plant near Snows Cut Bridge during WWII was shelled by a German submarine. I remember riding down there around 1966 to get bricks to pave our driveway in Wilmington. But then it seems we were no longer able to go there any more due to possible unexploded ordinance. Is there any truth to that?
